name: Dark Firefox about:blank
description: Changes the Firefox page <tt>about:blank</tt> to have a darker background.
additional_info: Changes the Firefox page about:blank to have a darker background. For this to be most useful, the Firefox setting When Firefox Starts should be set to Show a blank page, and the about:config setting browser.newtab.url should be set to about:blank. The clever bit: A naive styling of about:blank also affects page elements such as iframe. This style tries to prevent those elements (such as rich text editors, previews, etc) from getting changed by checking for attributes on the body tag. This isn't foolproof and the rule could be made more robust by adding additional attributes or also checking the parent html element.
